function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Data analysis involving physical interaction and close collaboration may pose a risk of disease transmission.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Using random sampling technique for data collection","category":"Data Collection","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Selection of sample size based on unlimited population","category":"Data Collection","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Pandemic causing suspension of construction projects","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Modification of construction management to accommodate sudden crises","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Suspension of projects due to contagious virus","category":"Neighbourhoods/Districts","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Time overrun due to pandemic control period","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of contagious virus in construction sites","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Fluctuation of material price and shortage of materials and supply chains","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Shortage of workers in urgent medical facility projects","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Long-term exposure to raised indoor temperature and humidity can result in severe sick building syndrome sbs symptoms.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor air pollutants causing annual loss of disability-adjusted life years dalys and economic losses.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traditional ieq monitoring protocol involving high-cost, invasive environmental sensors with limited spatial dimension and data storage.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Deficient traditional ieq measurement tools","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous improvement and upgrading of the intelligent built environment monitor ibem since 2014","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality monitoring","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inclusion of only five sensors may limit the comprehensive monitoring of environmental parameters and miss potential risks to human health.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Exclusion of sensors for chemical pollutants and noise levels may lead to undetected exposure to harmful substances and inadequate assessment of acoustic impacts on ieq.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Assessing room acoustic performance in an unoccupied room with hvac running and closed windows may not accurately reflect real-life conditions for disease propagation.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of immediate control means or technologies for acoustic environment in most buildings.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring of noise levels may be less valuable in comparison with other indoor environmental quality ieq parameters.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data transmission failure due to network interruption or device malfunction.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to visualize real-time ieq data due to display module malfunction.","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Temporary power supply failure leading to data loss or interruption in data transmission.","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Interference from heat dissipation affecting accuracy of air temperature and humidity sensors","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate data transmission and storage architecture","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate software design for data presentation and human-computer interaction","category":"Communication Network","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Measurement results not within the compliance range","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to measure noise level","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of dry ice and incense to create high co2 and pm2.5 concentrations","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contamination from unoccupied room with broad ieq conditions","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of variable refrigerant volume air conditioning system and humidifier for thermal environment control","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate co2 concentration and illuminance measurement due to lack of long-term baseline determination","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Unreliable temperature, rh, and pm 2.5 concentration measurements due to fluctuating outdoor weather and other factors","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of misleading data due to inaccurate baseline measurements and lack of self-calibration validity under certain conditions","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to poor indoor air quality and increased risk of disease transmission.","category":"Air","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High occupancy density leading to increased risk of disease spread and infection.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient cleaning and sanitation leading to microbial contamination and disease transmission through fomites objects or surfaces .","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Imbalance between supply and demand in thermal environment control","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overheating in the cold zone during winter","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient heating in the hscw zone during winter","category":"Energy Cycle","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Continuous monitoring of indoor thermal performance throughout the year may increase the risk of spreading contagious diseases within the building.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation in the hospital building may lead to high co2 concentrations, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elevated pm 2.5 concentrations in the hospital building may indicate poor indoor air quality, posing health risks to occupants.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Thermal discomfort in the offices may lead to reduced productivity and occupant dissatisfaction.","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation leading to high co2 concentrations in inpatient wards","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Insufficient air purification leading to high pm2.5 concentrations in various hospital areas","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Differences in climate and hvac systems between northern and southern china affect thermal experiences and preferences.","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overcooling problem in buildings in northern china","category":"Buildings/Blocks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Narrow range of adaptation to thermal environment in winter for occupants in northern china","category":"Settlement","confidence":"Medium"}]}
